column1: Company not participating in the Auto-Inclusion Scheme (AIS) for Employment Income

You must declare the taxable retrenchment benefits under 'Employment - Others' in your Income Tax Return and email us the following:  · Amount and breakdown of the retrenchment benefits; · A copy of  your employment contract; and  · A copy of the relevant documents relating to this lump sum payment.
column2: You do not need to report the retrenchment benefits in your Income Tax Return as your employer will submit the information to IRAS electronically.
